sentence: The hotel is in the middle of everywhere you want to be in Seattle just blocks from Pike Place Market Westlake Center thus the Monorail to Seattle Center and rail transport to SEATAC Seattle Art Museum great shopping and restaurants and bus stops to further locales like Pioneer Square Capitol Hill etc
Also check out the bar on the 5th floor Frolik is very very nice
Awesome staff rooftop bar excellent location and rooms
The Frolik restaurant bar was very nice for drinks eats
Bar setup was awesome look forward to going back when weather nice and we can have a drink outside
Great bar and restaurant
The internet was blazing fast and the TV had a good selection of channels
We also had a catered happy hour event for our group and the appetizers were really good
A reasonably priced breakfast is available across the road at Speciality ’s Café Bakery
Great water pressure in the shower and nice selection of toiletries
Did not eat at the Hotel went to convenient dinner opposite the hotel
No swimming pool No breakfast This is my kidss opinion
Lots of places to meet on the rooftop cafe downstairs restaurant has a great pool room to have drinks play pool and not be in a loud room so we could actually talk with each other and not shout
My only complaint is that the restaurant on the 5th floor automatically added a 20 percent tip for mediocre serve
We arrived late and there was no food or drink available in the hotel or nearby other than a few packaged snacks in the lobby
I did not try the on property restaurant but there is one
From being greeted with a glass of wine which is complimentary from 1 8 to the staff at their restaurant
Frolic on sight lounge closes at 12 AM … avoid using the elevator when it closes elevator use becomes much more complicated after 1 PM wine tasting that evolves into a Frolicking bar Closing Time
He got us checked in and gave us information about the restaurants in the hotel and other places we might be interested in
The GM greeted me and even had his business trips manager send up a bottle of wine and a cheese plate
